text: Borongan Airport is an airport in the city of Borongan and the only operating airport in the province of Eastern Samar, Philippines. ==Highlights== * In September 2008, Borongan Airport was opened. * The first flight landed on Borongan Airport on September 2, 2008. * In June 19, 2023, Borongan City unveiled a new airport terminal. == Airlines and destinations == ;Notes: :: The flight from Manila makes a stop in Cebu enroute to Borongan. ==References== Category:Airports in the Philippines Category:Eastern Samar
title: Borongan Airport
